\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w how|strong="G3779"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* born: \w His|strong="G1438"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w engaged|strong="G3423"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w*, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* marriage \w took|strong="G2192"\w* \w place|strong="G1722"\w*, \w she|strong="G1161"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w herself|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w pregnant|strong="G1064"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* power \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3650"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* fulfillment \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* words \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, where \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* –

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w woke|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* angel \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* directed \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.
